db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates managing Windows DWM features, jump lists, taskbar button overlay, and thumbnail toolbar.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = musicplayer
QT += widgets multimedia winextras
HEADERS = \ musicplayer.h \ volumebutton.h
SOURCES = \ main.cpp \ musicplayer.cpp \ volumebutton.cpp
RC_ICONS = images/qt-logo.ico
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/winextras/musicplayer INSTALLS += target
